title: 106_s2975
content: Requires the Secretary of Health and Human Services to develop formal investigation and compliance procedures with respect to complaints concerning failures of health benefits plans to comply with this Act. Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to apply the requirements of the Managed Care Integrity Act of 2000 to MedicareChoice organizations. Sets forth remedies with respect to failures to comply with this Act, including monetary penalties, and, with respect to MedicareChoice organizations, suspension of enrollment of individuals or payments.
